title: Online Learning Design and Educational Ecosystem Building: Applying Culturally Relevant Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental online learning platform utilization skills and understanding of basic pedagogical concepts
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen practitioner competencies due to the shift to online education in the COVID-19 era. Core objective is developing educational design capabilities reflecting cultural contexts in social studies

learning_goals: Within 12 weeks, learners can implement a three-stage (efficiency design → fine-tuning → feedback integration) online education design framework that considers cultural contexts.
Learners successfully apply real-time interaction strategies using digital education tools (Zoom, LMS, collaboration platforms) in 80% or more of simulations.
Learners develop a rubric for evaluating learning content that reflects social diversity (age, culture, disabilities, etc.) and achieve a score of 4 or higher (out of 5) in peer feedback.

resources: Digital educational authoring tools (Canva, H5P, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
